question:
[Robert] went to the car show with his sister [Lisa] and his mother [Julie]. [Charles]'s mother [Sarah] had to help him with his homework because he was having a test soon. [Lisa] and her brother [Robert] went to see a movie. [Carolyn] enjoys playing cards with her brother. His name is [Robert]. [Roger] loves to fish with his brother, [Charles] and his daughter [Carolyn]. [Julie] and her daughter [Lisa] went to see a movie yesterday and then got ice cream afterwards.
Question: How is [Sarah] related to [Lisa]?
